column3: To prepare to do this test make sure there are 4 journals publically available in DOAJ one with deposit policy Sharpea/Romeo, Diadorim or Dulcinea one with another deposit policy and deposit policy url provided one with another deposit policy and no deposit policy url provided one with no deposit policy
Search for every journal from the list above

column4: On the ToC of the journal with with deposit policy Sharpea/Romeo, Diadorim or Dulcinea - the deposit policy section displays correct policy name that is a link to relevant deposit policy page

On the ToC of the journal with another deposit policy and deposit policy url provided - the deposit policy section displays correct policy name that is a link to the deposit policy page provided by the publisher
On the ToC of the journal with another deposit policy and no deposit policy url provided - the deposit policy section displays correct policy name (no link)
On the ToC of the journal without deposit policy - the deposit policy section is not displayed
